Larry is more the archetype of founder, innovator, hacker, inventor, interested in all of the magical things that digital technologies do. But others say that Mr. Eric Schmidt 's two biggest job responsibilities- being the public face of the company and managing internal politics- are areas where Mr. Page has less experience.

in the Server and Tools Business, is leaving Microsoft. "Windows Azure is in a great place and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career," Steve Ballmer said in his e-mail. He has done stellar work for the company and will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team. Amitabh Srivastava has been with Microsoft since 1997 and played a central role in developing the Windows Azure cloud computing platform that just reached its one-year anniversary Feb. 1. shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.
